org.openscience.cdk

Class AminoAcid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.ChemObject
      • org.openscience.cdk.AtomContainer
        • org.openscience.cdk.Monomer
          • org.openscience.cdk.AminoAcid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, IAminoAcid, IAtomContainer, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IChemObjectListener, IMonomer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DebugAminoAcid, NNAminoAcid

    public class AminoAcid
extends Monomer
implements IAminoAcid, Serializable, Cloneable
    A AminoAcid is Monomer which stores additional amino acid specific informations, like the N-terminus atom.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Keywords:
    amino acid
    Created on:
    2005-08-11
    Belongs to CDK module:
    data
    Source code:
    HEAD
